main: ^Um. I am trying to get to Plettenberg Bay. Would you be able to help me?
^Yasis, I am so babbelas. What do you want channa?
^Plett? Awe brotha. The bru's from Jozi jol there all the time bru. It’s the best place  for pulling dolls and endless jols
^Oh, are you from Johannesburg? You must be what they call a ‘Joburg Boet.'
^Watch it brotha, you wanna be a big boy now huh?
^No sorry. I’m not from around here. How can I get there?
^Sho I’ll get the boys to show you but first thing I smaak some kos. My names Mamba, pleasure to meet you boet.
^My chaana, bring me some kiff bunny chow brotha, and i’ll help you get to Plett.
^Okay yes, I’ll be right back with that bunny chow…bru?
